Description: The unit features in-unit laundry, oak HW floors, high efficiency windows, all new plumbing, electrical, HVAC, sprinklers, and more! Building is located on a quiet street with a shared backyard. Close to the historic and culture filled Central Square. Easy access to the T (red line). Dogs are considered on a case by case basis for an additional $200/month upon landlord approval. Cats are OK for an additional $150per month. Security deposit negotiable. Tenants are responsible for their own water and sewer payments.
